UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Design of nontoxic analogues of cathelicidin-derived bovine antimicrobial peptide BMAP-27: the role of leucine as well as phenylalanine zipper sequences in determining its toxicity.
Literature.Author: Ahmad A, Azmi S, Srivastava RM, Srivastava S, Pandey BK, Saxena R, Bajpai VK, Ghosh JK

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 9144(MIC=3.2±0.6µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=3.0±0.6µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=15.3±0.7µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=3.1±0.6µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 10536(MIC=3.3±0.7µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 10536(MIC=8.1±0.7µM)
